ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | m2detleiblem1.n | |- N = { 1 , 2 } |
| 2 |  | m2detleiblem1.p | |- P = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` N ) ) |
| 3 |  | m2detleiblem1.y | |- Y = ( ZRHom ` R ) |
| 4 |  | m2detleiblem1.s | |- S = ( pmSgn ` N ) |
| 5 |  | m2detleiblem1.o | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 6 |  | m2detleiblem1.i | |- I = ( invg ` R ) |
| 7 |  | m2detleiblem1.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 8 |  | m2detleiblem1.m | |- .- = ( -g ` R ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ Z e. ( Base ` R ) ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ Z e. ( Base ` R ) ) -> Z e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 7, 5, 6, 10, 11 | #P_ringnegl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ Z e. ( Base ` R ) ) -> ( ( I ` .1. ) .x. Z ) = ( I ` Z ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. ( Base ` R ) /\ Z e. ( Base ` R ) ) -> ( ( I ` .1. ) .x. Z ) = ( I ` Z ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. ( Base ` R ) /\ Z e. ( Base ` R ) ) -> ( X ( +g ` R ) ( ( I ` .1. ) .x. Z ) ) = ( X ( +g ` R ) ( I ` Z ) ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` R ) = ( +g ` R ) |
| 16 | 9, 15, 6, 8 | #P_grpsubval | |- ( ( X e. ( Base ` R ) /\ Z e. ( Base ` R ) ) -> ( X .- Z ) = ( X ( +g ` R ) ( I ` Z ) ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. ( Base ` R ) /\ Z e. ( Base ` R ) ) -> ( X .- Z ) = ( X ( +g ` R ) ( I ` Z ) ) ) |
| 18 | 14, 17 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. ( Base ` R ) /\ Z e. ( Base ` R ) ) -> ( X ( +g ` R ) ( ( I ` .1. ) .x. Z ) ) = ( X .- Z ) ) |
